title: Misadventures in Filgersville
description: Chris Hastings, the stereotypical dumb jock, has sports taken away from him as punishment for poor grades right before his baseball team is to play in their championships. Chris must be tutored by the stereotypical nerd, Melvin Moore, in order to better his academic status. Once he improves he will be able to play on his team again, but it's not as easy as it seems. Along the way, he goes through many challenges: crushes, backstabbing friends, and his older brother.
author: Michael Colbert
